settings.text: Give customers details about the banner image(s) or content on the template.
Share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Column
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.main-heading: Clinically backed ingredients at the right price.
settings.description: Premium patented ingredients are the top dog when it comes to pet supplements. These scientifically backed ingredients are like the filet mignon of the supplement world, providing your furry friend with the best of the best.
settings.abt_prod: Soothes the nervous system, supporting normal response to external stressors
